example.name: autogen1
example.text: The space shuttle Atlantis boosted the Galileo spacecraft on its way to Jupiter , giving a big lift as well to an ambitious U.S. program of space exploration .
example.arg: to an ambitious U.S. program of space exploration

example.name: autogen2
example.text: After watching interest in the sport plummet for years , the ski industry is trying to give itself a lift .
